name: src/common/components/CustomSelectModule.js
MultiSelectInput
description: A component for multiple selection in drop-down list

name: SingleSelectInput
description: A component for a single item selection in drop-down list

name: CustomSelectModule
description: The CustomSelectModule module, offers pre-configured multiple and single item selection components.

name: src/common/PipeTransformModule.js
HideClass
description: The HideClass pipe, hides resources of given classes.

params.name: items
params.description: the array of resources to filter

params.name: classNames
params.description: the array of resource classes to hide

name: FilterBy
description: The FilterBy pipe, filters resources to select those that contain a given string in a given field.

params.name: items
params.description: the array of resources to filter

params.name: searchString
params.description: the string that the resource field must contain

params.name: propName
params.description: the resource field name

name: SetToArray
description: The SetToArray pipe, converts a given set to an array.

params.name: items
params.description: the set of items

name: OrderBy
description: The OrderBy pipe, sorts given array according to the given sort mode

unknown.tagValue: {Array} - the sorted array. If sortedMode equals "unsorted", the function returns the input array without changes.

params.name: items
params.description: the array of items to sort

params.name: sortMode
params.description:
the sort mode, the property of the item used for sorting
 with optional "-" prefix to sort in the descending order.

return.description: the sorted array. If sortedMode equals "unsorted", the function returns the input array without changes.

name: MapToOptions
description: The MapToOptions pipe, maps resources into objects for drop-down lists

unknown.tagValue: {Array<{id: string, text: string}>} - the array of drop-down list selection options

params.name: items
params.description:
the array of resources to convert to the array of selection options
which are objects with fields "id" and "text".

return.description: the array of drop-down list selection options

name: MapToCategories
description: The MapToCategories pipe, maps resources into categorized objects for drop-down lists

unknown.tagValue: {Array<{text: string, children: Array}>} - the array of categorized drop-down list selection options

params.name: items
params.description:
the array of resources to convert to an array of categorized selection options
which are objects with fields "text" and "children".

return.description: the array of categorized drop-down list selection options

name: PipeTransformModule
description: The PipeTransformModule module, exports open-physiology helper pipes

name: src/common/toolbars/ToolbarSettingsModule.js
ToolbarPropertySettings
description: The ToolbarPropertySettings component, offers a button to choose checkboxes with configuration properties from the drop-down menu.

params.name: options
params.description:
the list of properties to choose from, i.e., item types (resource classes)
  A configuration option is an Object with the visible label and the initial value, i.e.,

params.name: transform
params.description: an optional function that can be used to transform option appearance

emits.description: selectionChanged  - a user changed the value of a checkbox

name: ToolbarSettingsModule
description: The ToolbarSettingsModule module, offers the ToolbarPropertySettings component.

name: src/components/MeasurableGeneratorModule.js
MeasurableGenerator
description: MeasurableGenerator component, provides generation of measurables in a pop-up window.

params.name: item
params.description: a resource, typically, lyph, which inherits measurables from its type

params.name: clsMeasurable
params.description: the Measurable resource class to create new measurables

emits.description: closed - a user closed the modal window

name: MeasurableGeneratorModule
description: The MeasurableGeneratorModule module, offers the MeasurableGenerator component.

name: src/index.js
content: export {NestedResourceWidgetModule} from './panels/NestedResourceWidgetModule.js';

name: src/libs/jquery.js
src/libs/ng2-bs3-modal.js
src/libs/rxjs.js
content:
import Rx from 'rxjs';
global.Rx = Rx;

name: src/panels/AbstractResourceList.js
AbstractResourceList
description: The AbstractResourceList class implements methods common for upper level and nested resource lists.

properties.name: types
properties.description: the list of displayed item types (resource classes)

params.name: highlightService
params.description: the service that notifies nested components about currently highlighted item

name: getClassLabel
description: The getClassLabel function provides an human readable label for open-physiology class

params.name: clsName
params.description: the resource class name

name: src/panels/HighlightService.js
HighlightService
description: The HighlightService service notifies nested components about currently highlighted item

emits.description:
highlightedItemChanged$ - the event that the service emits when
a new item is highlighted in a nested resource widget

name: src/panels/ItemHeader.js
ItemHeader
description:
The ItemHeader component configures accordion header for a given resource. The header consists of a left side icon that indicates whether
the accordion tab is open or closed, the title formed from the resource's id and name, and the right hand icon that shows
the class of the resource. The is an option to include to the header a checkbox with an icon to mark the resource as active.

name: getResourceIcon
description: {Boolean} isActive - a boolean flag to indicate whether the item is active to draw or not the 'eye open' icon

name: constructor
description: {Object} options   - an optional object with boolean options to configure header appearance, i.e., {showActive: true}

name: src/panels/NestedResourceList.js
NestedResourceList
description: The NestedResourceList component, provides functionality for editing lists of resources.

name: constructor
description: the list of resources that can be added to the current list

params.name: newItem
params.description: an existing resource included to the current list

name: src/panels/NestedResourceWidgetModule.js
NestedResourceWidget
description: The NestedResourceWidget component, provides functionality for editing lists of entities.

unknown.tagValue: {Array<string>} - the set of hidden resource classes

return.description: the set of hidden resource classes

params.name: highlightService
params.description: the service that notifies nested components about currently highlighted item

params.name: option
params.description:
the object with the field "value" that defines the resource class and
 the boolean field "selected" that indicates whether the value is selected or not.

name: NestedResourceWidgetModule
description: The NestedResourceModule module, offers the NestedResourceWidget panel.

name: src/panels/ResourcePanelModule.js
ResourcePanel
description: The ResourcePanel component, generates fields for editting properties of a given resource.

properties.name: options
properties.description: the visualization options for the panel's commands toolbar

name: getPropertyLabel
description: The getPropertyLabel function replaces field name with human readable labels

params.name: option
params.description: the open-physiology resource field name

unknown.tagValue: {any}            - the initial (default) value for the visual attribute of the resource property

params.name: property
params.description: the resource property name

params.name: attribute
params.description: the visual attribute name that needs the default value

return.description: the initial (default) value for the visual attribute of the resource property

name: ResourcePanelModule
description: The ResourcePanelModule module, exports ResourcePanel component, toolbar modules and pipes.

name: src/test-app/app.js
TestApp
description: The TestComponent component, showing off the nested resource editor!

loadData
description: Create ApiNatomy data

params.name: model
params.description: the open physiology model

name: src/toolbars/ToolbarAddModule.js
ToolbarAdd
description: The ToolbarAdd component, offers a button to create a new resource from dropdown menu.

params.name: options
params.description: the list of item types (resource classes) to choose from

params.name: transform
params.description: an optional function that can be used to transform option appearance

name: ToolbarAddModule
description: The ToolbarAddModule module, offers the ToolbarAdd component.

name: src/toolbars/ToolbarCommandsModule.js
ToolbarCommands
description: The ToolbarCommands component, offers buttons to delete a resource, commit or rollback changes.

params.name: options
params.description:
a set of boolean options that indicate which buttons to show.
By default all three buttons are shown: {hideRemove: false, hideSave: false, hideRestore: false}

params.name: transform
params.description: an optional function that can be used to transform option appearance

emits.description: removed   - a user pressed the button to delete the item
canceled  - a user pressed the button to cancel changes (rollback)
saved     - a user pressed the button to save changes (commit)

name: src/toolbars/ToolbarFilterModule.js
ToolbarFilter
description: The ToolbarFilter component, offers an input field to specify search string and a dropdown menu to choose properties to which the filter is applied.

params.name: filter
params.description: initial search string

params.name: options
params.description: item properties to filter

emits.description: applied                 - a user pressed the button to filter the list of resources

name: ToolbarFilterModule
description: The ToolbarFilterModule module, offers the ToolbarFilter component.

name: src/toolbars/ToolbarSortModule.js
ToolbarSort
description: The ToolbarSort component, offers buttons to trigger sorting in ascending and descending order

params.name: options
params.description: item properties that define a sorting sort, e.g., ["Id", "Name", "Class"]

emits.description: sorted                  - a user pressed the button to filter the list of resources

name: ToolbarSortModule
description: The ToolbarSortModule module, offers the ToolbarSort component.
